#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>

long n, a [100001], b, m;

int main() {
 scanf("%d", &n);
 b=0;
 m=0;
 for (long i=1; i<=n; i++) {
  scanf("%d", &a[i]);
  }
 for (long i=1; i<=n; i++) {
  if (a[i]<m) {
   for (long j=i-1; j>=1; j--) {
    if (a[i]<a[j]) b++;
    }
   }
  if (a[i]>m) m=a[i];
 }
 printf("%d\n", b);
 return 0;
}
